mechanics.trigger: Creature succeeds on a saving throw against your cantrip
mechanics.condition: The cantrip is a damaging cantrip
mechanics.outcome: Creature takes half the cantrip's damage (rounded down) AND Creature suffers no additional effect from the cantrip

description_text: Starting at 6th level, your damaging cantrips affect even creatures that avoid the brunt of the effect. When a creature succeeds on a saving throw against your cantrip, the creature takes half the cantrip's damage (if any) but suffers no additional effect from the cantrip.
